title: Ep72 Fatal Friends
description: This week, the gals appreciate their friendship while discussing some that turned deadly. Topics include video game motivations for homicide, a casual "Weekend At Bernie's"-style body dump, and the value of juice rewards. Pop open a bottle of @WINC's The Independent white blend, cancel your birthday party, purge your Facebook friends list, and tune in for Fatal Friends.
